histogram.name: Remoting.Host.ChromeOs.AudioStream.AudioPlaybackMode
histogram.summary: Records the audio playback mode requested when starting an audio stream on the host device for a CRD session in CrOS.

histogram.name: Remoting.Host.ChromeOs.AudioStream.OnError
histogram.summary: Recorded once whenever the CRAS AudioManager reports a fatal audio stream error to AudioHelperChromeOsImpl::OnError() during a CRD session in CrOS. It is recorded only when an error occurs, so to determine the overall error rate against the total number of streaming attempts, refer to the success/failure metric `Remoting.Host.ChromeOs.AudioStream.StartResult`.

histogram.name: Remoting.Host.ChromeOs.AudioStream.OpenOutcome
histogram.summary: Records the result of opening an audio stream on the host device for a CRD session in CrOS.

histogram.name: Remoting.Host.ChromeOs.AudioStream.StartResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of attempting to start an audio stream on the host device for a CRD session in CrOS.
